model

Class PlayerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.PlayerController
      • model.PlayerModel

  • public class PlayerModel
extends PlayerController
    PlayerModel class is responsible for all the implementations regarding the player.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerModel

        public PlayerModel(java.awt.Point ballPoint,
                   int width,
                   int height,
                   java.awt.Rectangle container)
        PlayerModel is a Parameterized Constructor that handles the initial implementation of the player. Handles the player movement amount when game begins. Sets it to zero initially. Creates the player. Sets the min and max variables to set the dimensions of the player.
        Parameters:
        ballPoint - the location of the ball.
        width - the width of the player.
        height - the height of the player.
        container - the rectangular container/frame of the game screen.

    • Method Detail

      • makePlayer

        public java.awt.Rectangle makePlayer(int width,
                                     int height)
        makePlayer is a Method that creates the player of rectangular shape.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the player.
        height - the height of the player.
        Returns:
        returns a Rectangle player based on the dimensions specified.

        public boolean playerImpact(BallController b)
        impact is a Method that implements the impact of the ball on the platform.
        Specified by:
        playerImpact in class PlayerController
        Parameters:
        b - passing in the Object/Reference variable of the BallController class. Aggregation relationship.
        Returns:
        returns a boolean value denoting if an impact has occurred or not.
